sections.paragraph: ஆகிய, ஆகிலும், ஆதலால், எவ்விதத்திலும், அந்தப்படி, ஆகவே - இடைச்சொல்
truly therefore, verily as the case stands

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primary particle; properly assigning a reason (used in argument, explanation or intensification; often with other particles): - and, as, because (that), but, even, for indeed, no doubt, seeing, then, therefore, verily, what, why, yet.
